name: Happy Golden Blast
description:
Happy Golden Blast is an amazing match 2 game to bring you happiness every day! And the whole game is completely free! Download for fun!

• Instant coin reward for completing level;
• Very easy game tutorial, you can learn to play very quickly;
• 500+ levels, from simple to complex, just play again and again;
• Stuck? Use all kinds of props to easily complete the level;
• Bonus Spin for daily rewards;
• Get free coins by watching Ads in a coin shop, no purchase!

If you have any question playing Happy Golden Blast, contact us through suhcmgiuf5@gmail.com
